name: Extreme Hangman 2
description: In Extreme Hangman 2, your goal is to save the hangman by guessing the word. If you guess the word correctly, the hangman lives. If you guess wrong, the hangman dies. You’re only allowed a limited number of misses, so guess carefully. Extreme Hangman 2 boasts more than 3,000 words in 14 totally new categories, with 10 funny animations and 4 eye-catching backgrounds to choose from. Test your skill and try to save the hangman by guessing words in three difficulty levels.
